    Common Questions

    Everything You Need to Know
    Before You Book

    Still have questions? Reach out — we're happy to help.

    How long does a chimney sweep take? expand_more

    Most chimney sweeps take 60–90 minutes, including a visual inspection. Deep cleaning (PCR) or smoke chamber work may take longer. We'll give you a clear time estimate upfront.

    How do I know if I need a chimney liner replacement? expand_more

    Signs include flaking mortar, water in the firebox, or a failed Level II inspection. We offer stainless steel and flexible liner installations — both backed by a manufacturer warranty.

    Do you repair chimneys or just clean them? expand_more

    We handle the full range: tuckpointing, crown repair, cap installation, masonry restoration, flashing, and full rebuilds. If we find damage during an inspection, we show you HD photos and walk through your options.

    Can you service gas fireplaces and pilot lights? expand_more

    Yes — we handle gas fireplace repair, pilot light service, gas valve replacement, gas log installation, and remote control setup. We also service electric fireplaces and pellet stoves.

    How much does it cost? expand_more

    Every home is different, so we provide a thorough $99 inspection with clear pricing before any work begins. No surprises, no hidden fees — ever.

    What happens if you find something wrong during the inspection? expand_more

    We show you HD photos and video of exactly what we found, explain your options in plain English, and give you a clear quote. No work starts without your approval.

    Are your technicians certified and insured? expand_more

    Yes — every technician is CSIA certified, fully insured, background-checked, and drug-tested. They complete 200+ hours of training before entering your home.

    Do you remove animals from chimneys? expand_more

    Yes — we safely remove birds, squirrels, raccoons, and nests from your chimney. We also install chimney caps and spark arrestors to prevent them from coming back.
